com.atakmap.android.routes.nav

Class NavigationCue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.routes.nav.NavigationCue

  • public class NavigationCue
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a navigational cue along a route.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NavigationCue.ConditionalNavigationCue
      Class representing the guts of a Navigation Cue.
      static class  NavigationCue.TriggerMode
      Defines how the cue should be triggered--based on distance away from a point or estimated time until the point is reached.

        triggerValue - the trigger value related to the mode

        Returns:
        get all cues

      • inverseCue

        public static NavigationCue inverseCue(java.lang.String newCueId,
                                       NavigationCue cue)
        Creates a new cue that is the inverse of the one that is passed as a parameter. Conditional cues from the source cue will be preserved for the new cue.
        Parameters:
        newCueId - The ID that new cue should have
        cue - The cue to create the inverse of
        Returns:
        the navigation cue reversed.
